node.title: 3 Students Dead, Teacher and Others Injured in Michigan School Shooting; Suspect Arrested
node.alt: Three people were killed and six others injured in a school shooting Tuesday in Michigan, authorities said. Above, police tape hangs across a street in an unrelated incident on February 26, 2005, in Park City, Kansas.
node.description: Authorities said they received over 100 calls Tuesday afternoon about the active shooter incident at the high school.
node.content:
["Three students at Oxford High School in Michigan died Tuesday and six other individuals were injured during a shooting on campus, authorities said during an afternoon press conference.", "Authorities said a teacher was among the injured. The wounded were taken to local hospitals for treatment of their injuries, officials said.", "Authorities told reporters Tuesday afternoon that police began receiving calls about a possible active shooter incident at the high school at 12:51 p.m. local time. More than 100 calls were made to authorities in connection with the incident, officials said.", "One suspected shooter was taken into custody within minutes of the original calls to police, officials said. Authorities told reporters during the Tuesday afternoon press conference that the unnamed individual did not present any resistance when he was taken into custody.", "", "
Three people were killed and six others injured in a school shooting Tuesday in Michigan, authorities said. Above, police tape hangs across a street in an unrelated incident on February 26, 2005, in Park City, Kansas.
", "This is a developing story and will be updated as more information becomes available."]
